wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Tipping Aveling (6 July 1771 – 22 September 1820) was an Anglican priest in the late 18th and early 19th centuries.Aveling was born in West Bengal and educated at Corpus Christi College, Cambridge. He held incumbencies at Aspley Guise and Husborne Crawley. He was Archdeacon of Derry from 1813 until his death.
